topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e502d06368723197430c00#post_54e502d06368723197430c00
"based on 5 critics" vs "based on 36 critics"

Not the best example there, but I will say it all really comes down to opinion on whether Boom or 06 is worse.

Would you rather have an unfinished game that's just ridiculous and convoluted (06) or an unfinished game that's just plain boring (Boom)?
